SOLUTIONS.TITLE: How do I redeem eBay Bucks?
SOLUTIONS.TEMPLATE:
eBay Bucks is a rewards program that lets you earn eBay Bucks certificates when you shop on eBay and pay with PayPal. You have 30 days to spend your eBay Bucks on qualifying purchases. Your 30-day spending period begins the day your certificate is issued. The seller needs to accept PayPal.

Your eBay Bucks certificate is usually automatically applied to your purchase in the checkout process. If you don’t want to use your eBay Bucks certificate, click Remove next to "eBay Bucks certificate."

If the eBay Bucks certificate doesn't appear during checkout, follow these steps:

  1. Get your code from the eBay Bucks message we sent in My eBay. Continue through the checkout process.
    Note: You may see boxes for promotional codes along the way. Don't enter your eBay Bucks code in these boxes because they're usually for other types of gift certificates.
  2. On the PayPal payment page, enter your eBay Bucks code in the redemption box.
    Tip: To avoid mistakes, copy the code from the eBay message and paste it in the box.
  3. In some cases, you may need to click Enter gift certificate, reward, or discount to open the redemption box. Then enter your code.
  4. Click the Apply button.

Please also note that you cannot redeem eBay Bucks if you are using PayPal Mobile. You need to be logged in via your personal computer.

You can track your earnings, read about eBay Bucks news and special offers, and see when to expect your next certificate on your My eBay page.

Here’s how to check your eBay Bucks balance and payout date:

  1. Log in to your eBay account.
  2. Click My eBay.
  3. Click eBay Bucks under "Summary."
